message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  $10,000 is a good starting point, but I'm really looking to stay under $9,000. Would you be willing to come down a bit?

I understand you're looking to stay under $9,000, Bob. However, I've invested a lot in this product, and I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9,500. This is the lowest I can go, and I hope you can see the value in this amazing product.
